thread.title: BRIEF-Inphi Corp Announces Q4 Revenue $85.7 Million

title: BRIEF-Inphi Corp Announces Q4 Revenue $85.7 Million
text:
55 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Inphi Corp Announces Q4 Revenue $85.7 Million Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Inphi Corp: * ORATION ANNOUNCES Q4 AND FY 2017 RESULTS 
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.37 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS 
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.04 TO $0.06 EXCLUDING ITEMS * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $58 MILLION TO $62 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $85.7 MILLION 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.35, REVENUE VIEW $86.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* IN Q4 OF 2017, RECORDED A TAX BENEFIT OF $11.8 MILLION PRIMARILY DUE TO REVALUATION OF DEFERRED TAX LIABILITIES TO NEW FEDERAL TAX RATE Source text for Eikon:
